attributes.action: Scrap the proposal for the congestion charge in Greater Manchester.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you may be aware of how people are struggling hard to meet their increasing cost of living - the new proposal for congestion charge in Manchester will be another heavy blow to working class people of this region. The mounting cost of food and fuel itself is excruciating for people now. There are thousands of parents live around the proposed congestion charge place who wants to take their children to school and nursery and just imagine how much will affect them paying 1200 pounds per year for that reason alone. We have to remember one thing these people are not celebrities or high earned employers. Please scrap the proposal for sake of poor and middle class of people of this region.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
